Define a Transform

Source: R/transforms.R
ont_define_transform.Rd

Creates a transform definition that specifies how an output dataset is produced. Transforms can be SQL queries or references to R functions.

Usage

ont_define_transform(
  transform_id,
  transform_name,
  output_dataset_id,
  transform_type = c("sql", "r_function", "concept_eval"),
  code = NULL,
  input_datasets = NULL,
  description = NULL,
  created_by = NULL,
  con = NULL
)

Arguments

transform_id

Unique identifier for the transform.

transform_name

Human-readable name.

output_dataset_id

The dataset this transform produces.

transform_type

Type: "sql", "r_function", or "concept_eval".

code

SQL query or R function name.

input_datasets

Character vector of input dataset IDs.

description

Optional description.

created_by

Optional user.

con

Optional DBI connection.

Value

The transform_id (invisibly).
